short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes last 24 hours of posts and comments for any subreddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Subreddit Summarizer helps you quickly understand Reddit discussions using AI technology.

Key Features:
- AI-powered summaries of posts and comments
- Analysis of last 24 hours of subreddit activity
- Key takeaways from discussions
- Image presence indicators
- Dark mode interface
- One-click activation

Perfect for:
- Researchers gathering information
- Users wanting quick overviews
- Anyone looking to save time on Reddit

Technical Notes:
- Requires OpenAI API key
- Secure key storage
- No data collection
- Works on all Reddit pages

How to Use:
1. Install extension
2. Enter your OpenAI API key
3. Click the extension icon on any subreddit
4. Get instant summaries
